element-citation.article-title: APOE4 is associated with cognitive and pathological heterogeneity in patients with Alzheimer’s disease: a systematic review

citation-alternatives.mixed-citation: Emrani, S., Arain, H. A., DeMarshall, C. & Nuriel, T. APOE4 is associated with cognitive and pathological heterogeneity in patients with Alzheimer’s disease: a systematic review. Alzheimer’s Res. Ther.12, 1–19 (2020).
